title: Wind Release
description: Studying to be a yoga teacher? Learn the essential yoga poses the easy way with Yoga Stacks app! Personal trainer? More yoga poses to discover Plank Flow · Kumbhakasana Vinyasa Pyramid · Parsvottanasana Humble Warrior · Baddha Virabhadrasana Wind Release (Pavanmuktasana in Sanskrit) is a beginner yoga pose that belongs to the forward bends and supine categories. This asana targets lower back and spine, and also involves abs and knees muscles. Wind release improves digestion, massages reproductive organs; strengthens low back, stretches spine and also promotes breathing awareness.
